name: 陳儀
objective: This course is specifically designed for international students with Chinese proficiency at the A1 level. Centered around everyday life situations, it introduces Taiwanese society, culture, and related topics through text reading and thematic discussions, providing students with a basic understanding of these areas. The course includes assignments and in-class activities that offer ample opportunities to practice listening, speaking, reading, and writing in Chinese, aiming to enhance students’ overall language proficiency.
